content.description:
Climbs decent rock through the first four bolts then gets into somewhat scary terrain. The rock that the bolts are in seem fine but be careful as there seems to have been no cleaning during the route development. Much of what you might pull or stand on could come off.

Belayers should wear their helmet and be always aware of rocks coming down.
content.protection: Around 10 bolts to a rap hanger with a quick link and a normal hanger with a rap ring.

climbs.name: Stem It If You Get It

content.description: fun climb involving finding solid stems and great hand/finger jams.  some pockets too...
content.protection: small to medium.  nothing larger than blue c4, lots of small stuff (i used #00, 0, and 1 metolious master cam plus green C3)
content.location: this is the thin crack left of the chimney that separates the Dark Tower from the main wall.  you can climb up on a ledge and step across to start the climb, but this takes 10 feet off an already short climb.

content.description:
Starts with a tricky traversing sequence involving long moves and hard to find feet. Eases up considerably after 20 feet.

If you are shorter this route may feel considerably harder than if you are a taller climber due to the feet available to use.
content.location:
Located on the right(south) side of the Dark Tower.

To reach the dark tower continue left on the trail after reaching the scree field. It is the only obvious tower.

content.description:
Climb up the center of the face using good positive holds the entire way. It is a bit pumpy for the grade but offer several good rests. Fun route, good choice for a warm-up on the tower.

The rock appears to be loose and blocky from the ground but the route offer solid rock the entire way.
content.location:
Located on the right(south) side of the Dark Tower.

To reach the dark tower continue left on the trail after reaching the scree field. It is the only obvious tower.

content.description:
Climbs up overhanging wall on steep edges. Requires balance and body tension to pull through crux moves.

Starts easy but quickly moves into a crimp fest that will capture your full attention.
content.location: To the north of dark tower about 20 yards. Most easily accesses by walking around the tower and scrambling up immediately beneath the route.  Easily identified by the steep gray face with a black streak running down a portion of the route.

content.description: Crux is somewhere below the middle
content.protection: Its about 5 to 7 bolts but don't know exact
content.location: Its the route right before the dysfunctional wall
